Title: Danger Close
Writer: Stuart Beattie (screenplay by), James Nicholas (screenplay by), Karel Segers (screenplay by), Paul Sullivan (screenplay by), Jack Brislee (screenplay by)
Actors: Travis Fimmel, Richard Roxburgh, Luke Bracey, Alexander England
Plot: In August 1966, in a Vietnamese rubber plantation called Long Tan, 108 young and inexperienced Australian and New Zealand soldiers are fighting for their lives against 2500 North Vietnamese and Viet Cong soldiers.
